author: Mix
title: PSA: Netflix isn’t giving away free subs due to coronavirus — it’s a scam
description: Nope, Netflix isn’t handing out free subscriptions to its streaming service due to the coronavirus outbreak — you’re probably being targeted in a phishing scam. Users have taken to social media to report receiving suspicious texts, offering them “free passes”…
content:
Nope, Netflix isnt handing out free subscriptions to its streaming service due to the coronavirus outbreak youre probably being targeted in a phishing scam.
